data.title: U.S. Investors Are Buying the Dip as Bitcoin Hovers Above $90K
data.description: Bitcoin (BTC) rebounded above $90,000 over the past week, as extreme fear sentiment and US capital flows showed signs of improvement. On Nov. 21, the BTC price fell below $81,000. With the recent shift, the asset is trading close to $91,000 at the time of writing. According to data provided ...
data.keywords: Bitcoin price, Coinbase Bitcoin Premium, CBPI, Bitcoin, BTC price
